thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: EU Defends Iran Deal in Wake of Trump Warning

author: Julian E. Barnes
title: EU Defends Iran Deal in Wake of Trump Warning
text:
BRUSSELS—The European Union’s foreign policy chief said Wednesday that Europe would stick to the existing Iran deal, apparently distancing herself from a French proposal for a new agreement to address the concerns of the Trump administration.
As Tehran reiterated its stance that the deal wasn’t up for negotiation, Federica Mogherini, the EU foreign policy chief, said the existing deal is preventing Iran from developing a nuclear weapon.
... RELATED VIDEO Iran reached a historic agreement with major world powers over its nuclear program in 2015. Under the deal, what did Iran give up and how is it benefiting? WSJ’s Niki Blasina explains.
